name: Office Warfare
description:
Warning: This game only work with a controlers for 2 players.

Office Warfare is a project made during our first year at ICAN paris.

We were ask to make a fighting game for 2 players using Construct2.

Here's the link to our Game Doc (French)

Feel free to leave a comment and enjoy yourself.

Created By:

  •  Lucas DUPUIS - Lead Game Designer / Developper
  •  Claire JIQUEL - Game Designer / Sound Design / Documentation
  • Arnaud CHAMBEAU - Graphic Artist
  • Raphaël DEGRANGE - Lead Developper
